name: d3-regular-polygon
description: A d3 plugin for building regular polygons (equal angles and equal sides)

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-regular-polygon.js -- index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && terser build/d3-regular-polygon.js --compress --mangle -o build/d3-regular-polygon.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-polygon.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-regular-polygon.js build/d3-regular-polygon.min.js
